inclusion.criterion: Presence of cyanosis with < 93 % arterial oxygen saturation (measured by transcutaneous pulse oximetry)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pulmonary hypertension secondary to any etiology other than those specified in the protocol
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD. Pulmonary consult recommended an empiric, compassionate sildenafil trial.
